query_users_table: create table if not exists users (id integer AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,email varchar(50) UNIQUE,username varchar(50) UNIQUE,name varchar(100),pass char(60))
passwords_reset_token: CREATE TABLE if not exists password_reset_tokens (token VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, expiration_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
modify_movement_tokens: CREATE TABLE if not exists modify_movement_tokens (token VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, expiration_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
expenses_movements_table: CREATE TABLE if not exists expenses_movements (id integer AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,user_id INT NOT NULL,date DATE NOT NULL,category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,subcategory VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,concept VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL);
incomes_movements_table: CREATE TABLE if not exists incomes_movements (id integer AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,user_id INT NOT NULL,date DATE NOT NULL,category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,subcategory VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,concept VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,quantity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL);
